content: materials - 2 skeins of habu s bamboo 20/12 or 2 skeins of habu s dyed bamboo approximately 1 440 yards required - a us 3 3 25 mm 24-inch circular needle 1 gauge 28 stitches = 4 inches in lace pattern size 22 inches wide and 60½ inches long unblocked note there is enough yarn left over to make the shawl about 9 inches longer if you d like 1 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796
